statements: DELETE FROM MusicLibrary WHERE genre = 'Rock' AND year_released < 2000;
DELETE FROM MusicLibrary WHERE year_released < 2000 AND composer='John Williams';
DELETE FROM MusicLibrary WHERE genre='Rock' OR genre='Pop';
DELETE FROM recordings WHERE artist='Taylor Swift' AND duration_minutes > 3;
DELETE FROM recordings WHERE artist = 'John Doe';
DELETE FROM recordings WHERE artist = 'Taylor Swift' AND release_date < '2010-01-01';
DELETE FROM composers WHERE nationality = 'German' AND birth_year < 1800;
DELETE FROM music_groups WHERE num_members < 5 AND genre = 'Rock';
